Text:
Have a little problem after installing immortal throne. After I start the expansion and watch the intro movie and all... a box with the text 
"Immortal throne needs to update the original Titan Quest files in order to continue!"
And when i press ok... the game exits to windows WTF should i do about this!??
Thanks for all anwsers!

Um...I would try re-installing both Titan Quest and Immortal throne. Once TQ is installed copy this patch into the directory then install Immortal Throne. See if that works.
Have fun!
